languages.text: "Тогда ты немного запоздал{mf||а}, {name}! Как видишь, охота уже началась. И в этот раз даже не по моей прихоти — дичь сама заполонила мои угодья, как тут можно было усидеть на месте?" {n}Каллигос без стеснения хохочет.{/n} "А знаешь, Ваша Светлость фон Валанциус, присоединяйся к веселью? Я ведь не жадный — трофеев хватит на нас обоих".

traits.locale_text: "Тогда ты немного запоздал{mf||а}, {name}! Как видишь, охота уже началась. И в этот раз даже не по моей прихоти — дичь сама заполонила мои угодья, как тут можно было усидеть на месте?" {n}Каллигос без стеснения хохочет.{/n} "А знаешь, Ваша Светлость фон Валанциус, присоединяйся к веселью? Я ведь не жадный — трофеев хватит на нас обоих".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Then you're somewhat late, {name}! As you can see, the hunt has already begun. And this time it's not even my doing: the prey came to fill my hunting grounds by itself, so how could I resist?" {n}Calligos laughs without a shred of restraint.{/n} "You know, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship von Valancius, why don't you join in the revelry? I'm not greedy — this world has enough trophies for the both of us."
languages.original_text: "Тогда ты немного запоздал{mf||а}, {name}! Как видишь, охота уже началась. И в этот раз даже не по моей прихоти — дичь сама заполонила мои угодья, как тут можно было усидеть на месте?" {n}Каллигос без стеснения хохочет.{/n} "А знаешь, Ваша Светлость фон Валанциус, присоединяйся к веселью? Я ведь не жадный — трофеев хватит на нас обоих".

traits.locale_text: "Then you're somewhat late, {name}! As you can see, the hunt has already begun. And this time it's not even my doing: the prey came to fill my hunting grounds by itself, how could I just sit by and wait?" {n}Calligos laughs without embarrassment.{/n} "You know, your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship von Valancius, why don't you join the fun? I'm not greedy — there's enough trophies for us both."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "Then you're somewhat late, {name}! As you can see, the hunt has already begun. I'm not greedy — there's enough trophies for us both."

I'm not greedy — there are enough trophies for us both."

traits.locale_text: "Then you're somewhat late, {name}! As you can see, the hunt has already begun. And this time it's not even my doing: the prey came to fill my hunting grounds by itself, so how could I resist?" {n}Calligos laughs without a shred of restraint.{/n} "You know, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship von Valancius, why don't you join in the revelry? I'm not greedy — this world has enough trophies for the both of us."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: «¡Pues llega un poco tarde, {name}! Como puede ver, la cacería ya ha empezado. Y esta vez ni siquiera ha estado en mi mano: la presa ha acudido a mi coto de caza por su cuenta, ¿cómo iba a resistirme?». {n}Calligos ríe sin contención alguna.{/n} «Y digo yo, mi{mf|lord|lady} von Valancius, ¿por qué no participa de la diversión? No soy una persona avariciosa; en este mundo hay suficientes trofeos para los dos».
languages.original_text: "Then you're somewhat late, {name}! As you can see, the hunt has already begun. And this time it's not even my doing: the prey came to fill my hunting grounds by itself, so how could I resist?" {n}Calligos laughs without a shred of restraint.{/n} "You know, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship von Valancius, why don't you join in the revelry? I'm not greedy — this world has enough trophies for the both of us."

traits.locale_text: «¡Pues llega un poco tarde, {name}! Como puede ver, la cacería ya ha empezado. Y esta vez ni siquiera ha estado en mi mano: la presa ha acudido a mi coto de caza por su cuenta, ¿cómo iba yo a quedarme esperando?». {n}Calligos ríe sin ningún remordimiento.{/n} «Y digo yo, mi{mf|lord|lady} von Valancius, ¿por qué no participa de la diversión? No soy una persona avariciosa; hay suficientes trofeos para los dos».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: “那你恐怕有点来晚了，{name}！如你所见，狩猎已经开始了。这次甚至不是我找上门的，而是猎物自己跑到我的猎场来了，我怎么能耐得住性子呢？”{n}卡里戈斯毫不掩饰地放声大笑。{/n}“我说，冯·瓦兰修斯{mf|大人|女士}，不如一起来狂欢吧？这片森林里到处都是异形杂种。我不打算吃独食，这里的猎物够咱们两个人分。”
languages.original_text: "Then you're somewhat late, {name}! As you can see, the hunt has already begun. And this time it's not even my doing: the prey came to fill my hunting grounds by itself, so how could I resist?" {n}Calligos laughs without a shred of restraint.{/n} "You know, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship von Valancius, why don't you join in the revelry? I'm not greedy — this world has enough trophies for the both of us."

traits.locale_text: “那你恐怕有点来晚了，{name}！如你所见，狩猎已经开始了。这次甚至不是我找上门的，而是猎物自己跑到我的猎场来了，我怎么能坐视不管呢？”{n}卡里戈斯厚颜无耻地大笑起来。{/n}“我说，冯·瓦兰修斯{mf|大人|女士}，不如一起来找点乐子吧？这片森林里到处都是异形杂种。我不打算吃独食，这里的战利品够咱们两个人分。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: « Alors, vous arrivez un peu tard, {name}. Comme vous pouvez le voir, la chasse a déjà commencé et cette fois, ce n'est même pas de mon fait : le gibier est venu lui-même sur mes terres... Comment aurais-je pu résister ? {n}dit-il en riant à gorge déployée.{/n} Dites-moi, {mf|seigneur|dame} von Valancius... Que diriez-vous de vous joindre aux festivités ? Je ne suis pas égoïste, ce monde compte suffisamment de trophées pour nous deux. »
languages.original_text: "Then you're somewhat late, {name}! As you can see, the hunt has already begun. And this time it's not even my doing: the prey came to fill my hunting grounds by itself, so how could I resist?" {n}Calligos laughs without a shred of restraint.{/n} "You know, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship von Valancius, why don't you join in the revelry? I'm not greedy — this world has enough trophies for the both of us."

traits.locale_text: « Alors vous arrivez un peu tard, {name}. Comme vous pouvez le voir, la chasse a déjà commencé et cette fois, ce n'est même pas de mon fait : le gibier est venu lui-même sur mes terres... Je n'allais tout de même pas rester les bras croisés ! {n}dit-il en riant avec désinvolture.{/n} Dites-moi, {mf|seigneur|dame} von Valancius... Cela vous tenterait-il de vous joindre à moi ? Je ne suis pas égoïste, il y a suffisamment de trophées pour nous deux. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: 「ならば、少々遅かったようだな、{name}！見ての通り、狩りは既に始まっている。獲物が勝手に狩場を埋め尽くしてくれたのだ。どう我慢しろというのだ？」{n} カリゴスは恥ずかしげもなく笑う。{/n}「なあ、フォン・ヴァランシウスよ、お前も共に楽しまないか？俺は強欲ではない…この世界には、2人に十分な戦利品がある」
languages.original_text: "Then you're somewhat late, {name}! As you can see, the hunt has already begun. And this time it's not even my doing: the prey came to fill my hunting grounds by itself, so how could I resist?" {n}Calligos laughs without a shred of restraint.{/n} "You know, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship von Valancius, why don't you join in the revelry? I'm not greedy — this world has enough trophies for the both of us."

traits.locale_text: 「ならば、少々遅かったようだな、{name}！見ての通り、狩りは既に始まっている。獲物が勝手に狩場を埋め尽くしてくれたのだ。どう我慢しろというのだ？」{n} カリゴスは恥ずかしげもなく笑う。{/n}「なあ、フォン・ヴァランシウスよ、お前も共に楽しまないか？俺は強欲ではない…この世界には、2人に十分な戦利品がある」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Da kommt Ihr etwas spät, {name}! Wie Ihr sehen könnt, hat die Jagd bereits begonnen. Und dieses Mal ist es nicht einmal mein Werk: Die Beute ist von selbst in mein Jagdrevier gekommen, wie konnte ich da widerstehen?" {n}Calligos lacht ungeniert.{/n} "Warum macht Ihr nicht einfach mit, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft von Valancius? Ich bin nicht gierig. Auf dieser Welt gibt es genug Trophäen für uns beide."
languages.original_text: "Then you're somewhat late, {name}! As you can see, the hunt has already begun. And this time it's not even my doing: the prey came to fill my hunting grounds by itself, so how could I resist?" {n}Calligos laughs without a shred of restraint.{/n} "You know, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship von Valancius, why don't you join in the revelry? I'm not greedy — this world has enough trophies for the both of us."

traits.locale_text: "Da kommt Ihr etwas spät, {name}! Wie Ihr sehen könnt, hat die Jagd bereits begonnen. Und dieses Mal ist es nicht einmal mein Werk: Die Beute ist von selbst in mein Jagdrevier gekommen, wie konnte ich da einfach herumsitzen und warten?" {n}Calligos lacht ungeniert.{/n} "Warum macht Ihr nicht einfach mit, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft von Valancius? Ich bin nicht gierig. Es gibt genügend Trophäen für uns beide."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "O zaman bir miktar geç kaldın {name}! Gördüğün üzere av çoktan başladı. Hem de bu sefer başlatan ben değilim. Avım, av bölgemi kendiliğinden doldurmaya geldi. Buna nasıl karşı koyabilirdim?" {n}Calligos, en ufak bir çekinmesi olmaksızın kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Ne var, biliyor musun {mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius hazretleri? Eğlenceye neden sen de katılmıyorsun? Açgözlü değilimdir. Bu dünyada ikimize de yetecek kadar ganimet var."
languages.original_text: "Then you're somewhat late, {name}! As you can see, the hunt has already begun. And this time it's not even my doing: the prey came to fill my hunting grounds by itself, so how could I resist?" {n}Calligos laughs without a shred of restraint.{/n} "You know, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship von Valancius, why don't you join in the revelry? I'm not greedy — this world has enough trophies for the both of us."
